data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Rabat Sale Kenitra, Morocco that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rabat Sale Kenitra, Morocco
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Rabat Sale Kenitra, Morocco, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 953 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Rabat Sale Kenitra to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Rabat Sale Kenitra. Through your servants plant 916 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Rabat Sale Kenitra, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Rabat Sale Kenitra that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Rabat Sale Kenitra access to a Bible in their own language.

location.name: Rabat Sale Kenitra
